channel.title: The Fallout on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘The Apprentice’ and ‘The Fallout’ Producer Accused by Feds of Scamming $12 Million
item.description: The many flim-flams Robert Brown is accused of include a Ponzi scheme, a fake domestic terrorist group project and a COVID-19 testing con.
